Bosch Mobility
Bosch Mobility
218,146 followers
218,146 followers
At Bosch, our engineers push boundaries — both on the test bench and on the track.

Behind every smooth ride is a system built with precision. From optimizing powertrain performance to enhancing the rider experience, we constantly engineer solutions that deliver more power, greater efficiency, and unmatched comfort — mile after mile.

As we mark 10 years ofin two-wheeler mobility, the Rider Stories celebrates engineers like— those who ride, build, and redefine what’s possible.

The final story of the series drops soon. Stay tuned. 😊

Toddle - Your Teaching Partner
Toddle - Your Teaching Partner
71,475 followers
71,475 followers
5mo • 
 5 months ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Toddle Demo Day 4.0 is here. This changes so much for educators. 👇

Join us as we bring the power of AI to the most demanding aspects of teaching: curriculum design, assessment, and grading.

Imagine what you can achieve with:
🔥 A limitlessly creative curriculum planning assistant to elevate every step of planning, from units to lesson plans.
🔥 AI-powered worksheets that transform simple objectives into high-quality assessments in seconds.
🔥 A smart grading companion that takes a great first pass at evaluating student work, cutting your grading workload in half.

Come see it live on March 13, or sign up to get the recording.

Led engagements with 10+ startups in sectors like FinTech, AgriTech, Vertical SaaS, Logistics & Consumer
- Worked deeply with the founders of a series A startup on ideation & execution of projects like org design, business model redesign, employee NPS & leadership training; Helped setup capabilities like business finance, OKRs, PMO
- Built the roadmap to reduce monthly burn for a client by $1M via efficiencies such as LTV growth via account farming, CAC optimization and Org restructuring; project currently under implementation with a $300k savings already realized
- Leveraged insights from engagements to create playbooks for B2B burn reduction, account management & leadership development

Apr 2019 - Jul 2020 · 1 yr 4 mos
Apr 2019 to Jul 2020 · 1 yr 4 mos
Elected by an electorate of 11,798 students to Chair the Students Senate (highest student position at IIT KGP)
• Led 50+ office bearers & 150+ fest coordinators; executed 100+ year-long events; managed 18 societies and a total budget of INR 140 m
• Part of the core team created to tackle Covid-19, ensured safety the 25k+ campus residents; making it the only COVID-free area in KGP
• Arranged safe and legal transport for 300+ students from cyclone-affected rural regions by working with the district and state authorities
• Promptly established preventive systems like Quarantine ward, Medical QRT, Thermal Scanners, Campus Lockdown and Essentials Delivery
• Ideated the academic plan for the affected and next semester, liaised with the administration to get it approved in the Institute Senate
• Co-Conveyer for the 54th Inter-IIT Sports Meet; managed a total budget of INR 40 m; saw a footfall of 2348 students, faculty and officers

May 2020 to Jun 2020 · 2 mos
Project: Tasked at trading derivatives in the global oil markets by conducting trend analysis and market study
• Realized a 65% success rate generating a profit of $ 5200 during the period; executed a total of 350+ trades exceeding all given targets
• Conducted trend-line and price analysis to identify trade entry and exit points for Crude Oil (CL), Heating Oil (HO) and Gasoline (RBOB)
• Realized a success rate of 53% in automated trades; developed algorithms using Algo Design Lab and identified optimum stop-losses
